fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e1.equipments.batteries

Class Batteries

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e1.equipments.batteries.Batteries
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI, BatteriesImplementationI

    public class Batteries
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
implements BatteriesImplementationI
    The class Batteries implements a component for the batteries.

    Description

    Implementation Invariants

     invariant       totalInPower.getMeasurementUnit().equals(POWER_UNIT)
 invariant       totalMaxOutPower.getMeasurementUnit().equals(POWER_UNIT)
 invariant       nominalCapacity != null && nominalCapacity.getData() > 0.0 && nominalCapacity.getMeasurementUnit().equals(CAPACITY_UNIT)
 invariant       FAKE_CURRENT_CAPACITY.getData() <= nominalCapacity.getData()

    Invariants

     invariant       MAX_OUT_POWER_PER_PARALLEL_UNIT != null && MAX_OUT_POWER_PER_PARALLEL_UNIT.getMeasurementUnit().equals(POWER_UNIT)
 invariant       IN_POWER_PER_PARALLEL_UNIT != null && IN_POWER_PER_PARALLEL_UNIT.getMeasurementUnit().equals(POWER_UNIT)
 invariant       FAKE_CURRENT_CAPACITY != null && FAKE_CURRENT_CAPACITY.getData() > 0.0 && FAKE_CURRENT_CAPACITY.getMeasurementUnit().equals(CAPACITY_UNIT)

    Created on : 2025-09-25

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

      • Batteries

        protected Batteries()
             throws java.lang.Exception
        create a batteries component with one set of batteries in parallel, one set of one batteries in series, a generated URI for its reflection inbound port and the standard URI for the in bound port offering the BatteriesCI component interface.

        Contract

         pre     !(this instanceof ComponentInterface)
 post    nominalCapacity().equals(new Measure<Double>(CAPACITY_PER_UNIT.getData(), CAPACITY_PER_UNIT.getMeasurementUnit()))
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • Batteries

        protected Batteries(int numberOfCellsInParallel,
                    int numberOfCellGroupsInSeries)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        create a batteries component with given number of sets of batteries in parallel and in series, a generated URI for its reflection inbound port and the standard URI for the in bound port offering the BatteriesCI component interface.

        Contract

         pre     !(this instanceof ComponentInterface)
 pre     inboundPortURI != null && !inboundPortURI.isEmpty()
 pre     numberOfCellsInParallel > 0
 pre     numberOfCellGroupsInSeries > 0
 post    nominalCapacity().equals(new Measure<Double>(numberOfUnitsInParallel * numberOfUnitGroupsInSeries * CAPACITY_PER_UNIT.getData(), CAPACITY_PER_UNIT.getMeasurementUnit()))
        Parameters:
        numberOfCellsInParallel - number of batteries unit put in parallel to have a higher input and output power.
        numberOfCellGroupsInSeries - number of sets of parallel batteries unit put in series to get more capacity.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • Batteries

        protected Batteries(java.lang.String inboundPortURI,
                    int numberOfCellsInParallel,
                    int numberOfCellGroupsInSeries)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        create a batteries component with given number of sets of batteries in parallel and in series, the given URI for its reflection inbound port and the given URI for the in bound port offering the BatteriesCI component interface.

        Contract

         pre     !(this instanceof ComponentInterface)
 pre     inboundPortURI != null && !inboundPortURI.isEmpty()
 pre     numberOfCellsInParallel > 0
 pre     numberOfCellGroupsInSeries > 0
 post    nominalCapacity().equals(new Measure<Double>(numberOfUnitsInParallel * numberOfUnitGroupsInSeries * CAPACITY_PER_UNIT.getData(), CAPACITY_PER_UNIT.getMeasurementUnit()))
        Parameters:
        inboundPortURI - URI of the inbound port offering the BatteriesCI component interface.
        numberOfCellsInParallel - number of batteries unit put in parallel to have a higher input and output power.
        numberOfCellGroupsInSeries - number of sets of parallel batteries unit put in series to get more capacity.

        java.lang.Exception - to do.
